products.title: Hive Silkweave Raven Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hivesilkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb dim-out fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hive silkweave" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Made to measure hive silkweave raven black perfect fit pleated blind, px78003.

products.title: Hive Silkweave Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hivesilkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb dim-out fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. products.title: Hive Blackout Iron Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout iron perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
